attributes.action: declare November the 12th National AC/DC appreciation day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think the title speaks for itself.

They are one of the most influential bands of this time and all the members are official citizens of the british empire- with the lead singer Brian Johnson being born in Newcastle.

They are kings among men and deserve recognition.

Thank you.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
